gemini-2.5-pro.description: Stable version of Gemini 2.5 Pro, our mid-size multimodal model that supports up to 1 million tokens, released in June of 2025
gemini-2.5-pro.best_for: Complex reasoning, advanced coding, multimodal tasks

gemini-2.5-flash.description: Stable version of Gemini 2.5 Flash, our mid-size multimodal model that supports up to 1 million tokens, released in June of 2025
gemini-2.5-flash.best_for: Balanced performance, general tasks, fast responses

gemini-2.0-flash-001.description: Stable version of Gemini 2.0 Flash, our fast and versatile multimodal model for scaling across diverse tasks, released in January of 2025

gemini-1.5-pro-002.description: Stable version of Gemini 1.5 Pro, our mid-size multimodal model that supports up to 2 million tokens, released in September of 2024
gemini-1.5-pro-002.best_for: Very long context tasks, document analysis

gemini-1.5-flash-002.description: Stable version of Gemini 1.5 Flash, our fast and versatile multimodal model for scaling across diverse tasks, released in September of 2024

gemini-1.5-flash-8b.description: Stable version of Gemini 1.5 Flash-8B, our smallest and most cost effective Flash model, released in October of 2024

gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp.description: Preview release (April 17th, 2025) of Gemini 2.5 Flash with thinking capabilities
gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp.best_for: Complex reasoning with visible thought process

gemini-2.0-flash-exp-image-generation.best_for: Image generation and visual content creation

key_features_2025.multimodal: Text, vision, audio support across models
key_features_2025.image_generation: Available in specialized image generation models
key_features_2025.cached_content: Supported for efficiency in Pro models
